name: Table Tennis (itch) (MysticalPiano)
description: Simple table tennis game with 1 player and 2 player modes. When playing by yourself you play against a computer. The computer has 3 difficulties, which can be changed by clicking the top left of the screen. There are some differences in the game then normal table tennis. Randomly, a wall will spawn in the middle of the screen and the ball will be stuck on one side depending on where it is. There is also a powerup on the top right which makes your paddle faster in single player mode. Use w and s to move up and down in single player. Use w/s and up/down to play with 2 players.
